basics.name: Mirabela Medallon

basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2020.

awards.title: Natural Science Foundation Bridges to Baccalaureate: Strategic Alliance for Minority Participation Award
awards.summary: The NSF B2B STAMP Award program supports and advances STEM Education and transfer of Native Hawaiian and Underrepresented Minority students into a baccalaureate STEM degree.

awards.title: Best Entertainment/Gaming App: 1st Place
awards.summary: Our team, Team Turretz, won first place. I gained experience in Unity and C# to program a VR game for the Microsoft HoloLens.
